reviewText:
I'm usually ashamed by some of the DVD's I buy, but this one is okay because it contains some very helpful exercise routines.  This is probably best suited for beginners, but the routines they demonstrate are good at concentrating on all parts of the body.  I make sure that I exercise to this movie at least once a day.

...  They're pretty, physically fit, and I bet they're really nice too.  If it takes DVD's like this to promote a healthy lifestyle, so be it.

This video by the creator of 20 minute workout is a treat for fans of the old series from the eighties.  Everything you remember is here:  the all-white sets, the spinning disks, overhead cameras, cheesy synthesized 80's rock, and beautiful ladies.  The only thing missing are the leg warmers--oh! AND of course they're all nekkid!  Good retro memories.

this video is one of the few simply erotic andanatomically interesting videos there are.the only unnatural items to be seen where lipstick-almost inevitable,and one of the three girls,obviously lightened hair.

Like the title says, this video is entirely filled with nude women doing aerobics. They're wearing nothing but socks and sneakers, and they do their exercises as if nothing is amiss. The action happens in a solid white room, giving it that Matrix look. The camera slowly circles the girls, sometimes showing a top-down shot that is a bit weird. Unlike some "Nude [Something]" videos, this one actually shows more than just waist-up nudity. When the girls bend over, the camera shows it all. There are even one or two brief close-ups.

i just received the dvd and decided to work-out, but there was no instructor and the moves were near impossible to see b/c the video is of  their lips and hair.  yes, there are nude people, but it's a waste of money  if you plan on exercising to it!
It is similar to other videos made by the great Ron Harris (StarShapes)  but does not have the quality and closeups you would expect from him.
can someone tell me if they are really naked in this video, and if so , why isn't it rated r or x?
good job thx
Very sexy group of ladies! I would like to see the camera focus on each girl for a longer period of time rather that the 6 second shots we get for most of the dvd.
yes the women are nude and nice looking. What else is there to say
Loads of laughs and very entertaining.
all the girls are prime and they really do exercise
Great workout video.  Tasteful

Depending on your expectations....this video can be taken in two entirely different ways.  As a 'Soft core jiggle film' with those who have a fetish for naked women doing very simplistic aerobics...(or for those guys who have ever watched sexy clothed women in an aerobics class and wished they could see them exercising naked)...This dvd is PERFECT for that crowd!  But if you were hoping for a SERIOUS EXERCISE video that happens to combine an actual legitimate serious aerobic workout with an erotic all nude theme....this dvd is A BIG JOKE!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  It is essentially just a compilation of nude (albeit, VERY attractive) female models on a simple white soundstage doing the most simplistic fake aerobic moves that actually resemble something a stripper might do if she tried to incorporate light exercise into her strip routine.  The camera angles are silly: with crossfades between overhead shots, rotating Master shots, and options for close-ups of body parts.  The only audio is a lame generic music track and there is NO Host leading the exercise, and NO Audio direction explaining the (exercises), or guiding you through the (routines).  Actually the moves the young women are doing look either incredibly boring, tedious and silly...or dangerous with the potential to cause strains and injuries.  There is no warm-up or real cool down.  This dvd contains NOTHING even remotely close to a "legit exercise routine".  Nave overweight Perv that I am...I was actually hoping this would motivate me to exercise with light aerobics featuring sexy naked girls jiggling around.  This only (barely) delivered the Latter.  If you're a member of the 'masturbatory crowd' with a fetish for very soft core nude videos with a 'faux aerobic theme' with pretty naked girls pretending to go through silly yoga and simplistic dance moves....then this dvd is PERFECT FOR YOU!!!!  But if, like me, you were naively actually hoping for a legitimate aerobic exercise that just so happened to have the routines performed by (butt naked, but still actual legit aerobic exercisers)....then this dvd is a complete waste of time and major disappointment!  :(

On the plus side....this dvd isn't a total lost.  Like those 'nature/wildlife ambiance videos',  like: 'fish in aquariums', beauty shots of 'waterfalls', or 'rolling surf at the beach', (like that which plays on monitors in your dentists office)....I think this can be used as a type of 'erotic screensaver' for my HD TV.  As 'background ambiance' playing on my dvd player, (as I relax, or work in my private man-cave/den)....this can be PERFECT as a type of "relaxing erotic mood-setter" to glance over to occasionally, to see pretty naked sexy girls with asses wiggling, and titties jiggling on my flatscreen!
Good product, arrived in a timely manner.
get all blu ray classic sci-fi and horror movies before corps start phazing dvds and blu rays out in the near future .
I can watch this over and over  :-)

This came out at time when it seemed that exercise shows and tapes were vying to be the sexiest or most provocative. Many top stars (starlets) were getting in on the craze and making an extra buck or two.
The clothed version on the disc fits right into this but the nude version is pure hot entertainment! You won't be disappointed by either version.
very outdated. good for the 80s
Love it.
be still my heart

TOTALLY AWESOME :)
I bought 3 more of the same dvd after buying and viewing the dvd. (Gave 1 copy as a gift and have 1 as back-up copy and 1 as a potential gift). Its the only dvd that is so AWESOME that a back-up copy and giving as exceptional gifts is justified, since it is totally AWESOMELY sexy and still tastefully, artfully done).
Received this promptly as promised.  Was packaged well.  I HATE the DVD though.  Definitely not what I expected.  Maybe that means I should not have been ordering it in the first place!
Excellent shipping excellent movie because the movies a rubric nude women who knows to do excellent moves of a rubric it was good I thing I may be wrong but go buy see if you like it
Not bad.  Recomend for anyone who ever wondered what it would be like to watch a totally naked work out.

This is a great companion to "Totally Nude Balance Ball Workout", the music & the women are in perfect harmony here, you get both the nude & clothed versions, but the nude version in the best, seeing nude women in synchronized movements together is a big plus here, as well as some of the solo workouts, you will not be bored with this one, if you like four nude women working out together, than this is your DVD!!

there is a bouncy tight leotard segment, from the 70's....the only interesting part was the martial arts moves. this was smokin' sensual, but none of it adds up to a workout. the women are pretty but its too lame for porn and too slow to workout with.
Fun DVD to watch again and again. Especially the extra views. Get it if you like fit women showing it off while they work out.

The girls are ALL VERY PRETTY, but I wanted something more structured as a workout I guess. I thought this would get me off the couch and watch some naked babies go through a low impact exercise to help me lose some weight. I think ten year old boys would appreciate this dvd like I did with National Geographic when I was young. Like I said though, the girls are all beauties, but not what I expected.

This is without a doubt, my first choice for best reveals on a workout DVD.

There is nothing like young fit girls flashing you their private parts, and flexing their girl muscles to get you going.

My second choice is Totally nude balance ball workout.

Have fun!
The title says it all! If you like healthy, fit females, this is the dvd for you. My wife enjoys it which makes me enjoy it even more!
What can I say? Boring. Oh... I need 5 more words to publish the review... Boring Boring Boring Boring Boring!

Actually nice to watch, and somewhat useful as an instruction aid. Many of the sequences require at least two participants, and since I exercise alone these are useful only as viewing material. However the video maintains the viewer's attention, and the actors/instructors are easy on the eyes.

Wow, being as that I'm a perv, have a sense of humor, and somewhat into physical fitness, why would I NOT order this excellent DVD?? I didn't really order it to follow along, mostly as just a goof. Good thing, as the "excercises" consist of a LOT of senseless bouncing, NO instruction, akward trasitions, and lots of distracting nudity. This video is pretty much useless as an instructional aerobic dvd, BUT, watching it will DEFINITELY bring you delight in the sheer goofyness and straight-faced commitment by the naked ladies. I recommend having a glass or five of wine, grabbing your girlfriend, and putting on this fun DVD. You will BOTH enjoy the sensual sounds and bodies of these classic aerobic ladies, providing you're not expecting a porno and have a sense of humor. The MUSIC is quite fun and catchy,(and repetitive) and goes well to the swinging utters of these foxy ladies from the 80's! NICE!!! Worth picking up to add to your "Pervy Workouts" collection!!!

Decades ago, Ron Harris was inspired to put beautiful an' fit young women on cable TV in thong leotards doing aerobics...sexy an' sensuous aerobics that featured unique an' provacative closeups...There was no voiceover instructions...only perfectly-synchronized electronic music...it was a huge hit, an' these beautiful an' sensual women became the stuff of fantasy for millions of young viewers (mostly male, I'd suspect).
Now, fast forward, an' we find that Ron Harris had many of (what turned out to become) the most popular of these aerobicise routines filmed with these lovely young women completely nude.  The effect is mesmerizing...This is not porn, an' the movements are identical to the non-nude originals...by today's standards, the entire collection is amazingly tame. Beautiful young women in the altogether, just being beautiful, but so tastefully done.  And, this is the way most regular viewers fantasized about these gorgeous women 'way back when...in the nude.  It's a mischievous prayer being answered...I highly recommend this DVD to anyone who loved an' looked forward to the 1980's original Aerobicise programs...It does not disappoint in any way - video/audio quality is excellent. If you ever dreamed about seeing these exact same aerobics performed - without those teasing leotards - this DVD is for you.  Also includes the same routines as originally aired, with the skimpy leotards...

Engaging as we watch some gals do some exercises, though it appears that their necks get most of the work as they fling their heads back and forth.  It looks almost painful.  There is a clothed version and then a version without clothing. Some funky music that sticks in your head for a day.  There is no commentary.

It is entertaining, somewhat of a spoof after you have seen other regular work-out vids. There are about four different scenes with different gals in front of a white background.

A really nice DVD.

Watching the clothed part first then the second nude one was cool.

Very lovely models and very nice positions.
Also the extra views were a real bonus.

A voyeurs delight.

anybody thats is looking at this video for a workout, your lying to yourself,you know this not a workout video this is T&A flick thats all. I LIKE IT, anybody that wants to see a T&A flick will like it too. The girls are beautiful,great bodies,they show alot of thier goodies. If you want a workout go to jane fonda or something. this was made just for fun.

Totally Nude Aerobics is three hours and thirty-four minutes long; that includes the Totally Nude Aerobics, New Aerobics, and Play Both Movies together and was released on DVD on April 2, 2000. With the exception of the opening and closing credits, the women are totally nude and naked in the Totally Nude Aerobics sections. In the New Aerobics the women are wearing what looks like a black one piece bathing suit in four scenes and regular aerobics workout outfits in the rest. The seven women in the video do a variety of aerobics exercise. The lone woman one the cover of the DVD is only in featured in the Cool Scene; the only slow scene in the workout. Since it is all music and no instruction, it is hard to keep pace to what they are doing and most of the time you need a partner. Even if you had a partner and could follow along, this video exercise would fall in the intermediate and up. The ladies in this DVD move at a pretty fast pace. The seven ladies are:

Carol Boudreau
Lisa Erwin
Shayna Lee
Elena Nevado
Shianne Seacord
Evelyn Terjanszky
Collette White

Also included in the DVD is a Camera Icon; whenever that is shown you hit the menu button for a thirty second close-up. The Camera Icon is only featured in the nude segments on and not the clothing segment. Totally Nude Aerobics gets an AAA+++ for entertainment only.

DVD FEATURES

1. Totally Nude Aerobics-53 minutes
a. Scenes
i. Opening Title
ii. Stretching
iii. Jumping
iv. Group Stretching
v. Squats & Bends
vi. Crunches
vii. Body Movement
viii. Aerobics
ix. Cool Down
x. Leg Lifts
xi. Group Final
2. New Aerobics-54 minutes
b. Scenes
i. Opening Title
ii. Stretching
iii. Jumping
iv. Group Stretching
v. Squats & Bends
vi. Crunches
vii. Body Movement
viii. Aerobics
ix. Cool Down
x. Leg Lifts
xi. Group Final
3. Play Both Movies-107 minutes
4. Slide Show
I FOUND NOTHING BORING ABOUT THIS DVD LIKE A LOT OF COMMENTS HAVE STATED! NOTHING LIKE A GOOD WORKOUT IN THE BUFF WITH GORGEOUS LOOKING BABES AND THEIR HOT BODIES!

I can't vouch for the effectiveness of the workout routine, but for spectators, the "jumping" session at least is pure gold. It's only too bad that the rest of the video wasn't as action packed. Maybe the other actresses weren't up to it? haha ;) Not that they don't look very nice also... The music is better than average and together with the big hair gives this video a bit of retro vibe.

Awkward at best. I have to admit, I was looking for a real workout DVD with nude instructors. This is not it. Even if you are just looking for naked girls that like to hop in place, this will not satisfy you.

Totally Nude Aerobics is 53 minutes long and was released in 1995. With the exception of the opening and closing credits, the women are totally nude and naked. The seven women in the video do a variety of aerobics exercise. Since it is all music and no instruction, it is hard to keep pace to what they are doing and sometime you need a partner. Even if you had a partner and could follow along, this video exercise would fall in the intermediate and up. They ladies move at a pretty fast pace. The seven ladies are:

Carol Boudreau
Lisa Erwin
Shayna Lee
Elena Nevado
Shianne Seacord
Evelyn Terjanszky
Collette White

Totally Nude Aerobics gets an AAA+++ for entertainment only.
What a great dvd. The ladies are not stop and so beautuful. Really loved the totally nude version.

This DVD is titillating but definitly not explicit. The nude scenes do show everything with tasteful camera angles but unless you're a 15yo school boy it wouldnt raise your eyebrows let alone anything else. The girls are beautiful, fit & healthy looking with not an implant in sight which for me was very refreshing, & the closeups focus on faces breasts & the body, NOT genitalia. To call this soft porn is an overstatement, it is in fact nude & non nude aerobic art that titilates. If you're a prude, or of religious background, or just someone who doesnt like nudity then this is not for you. Simily if you're looking for explicit closeups of genitalia then again not for you.
I give it 4 stars because it is a Ron Harris

This was a short workout video.  It needed to have more women and better close ups with better lighting.  The women in the video were OK but it would have been nice to see it filmed in a real life exercise studio setting rather than in a production studio.  After about 15 min it was boring to see the same women over and over.  There could have been a better selection of women other than all Caucasian with large (fake) breasts and way too much pubic hair.  Not sure I learned anything about aerobics.

I thought this would be a little like the old videos from the early 80s. It's not. The "exercises" are not very meaningful or sensual. Either clothed or not.
I would not recommend this for either an exercise DVD or a turn on. It's not.

Very good, as to be expected from Ron Harris. Really enjoyed seeing this dvd.

Beautiful women, nice set, just like the original except in the nude.
if you liked the 20 min workout in the 80's you will love this nude virsion.

I've owned this DVD for some time now. I've watched it several times and enjoyed it very much each and every time. The women are beautiful and seem

to be really having fun as they exercise, especially nude. The clothed version is very nice, too. Of course, being a guy, I prefer them nude.

I also like the fact tha the four women seem to have no modesty at all--

they never tried to cover up or hide anything; in fact, sometimes they seemed to be exposed a little more than necessary (no complaints here!).

I like this DVD very much and would recommend it to any man who wants to enjoy watching beautiful nude women, also to any man who wants to get his wife to exercise (especially nude and beautiful).
much better than the other videos.. and has close up sections in bonus click...plus has the clothed version too

Depends on how you look at it. The nude portion did not really have much to do with aerobics. If all you wanted to see were nude women performing squats, etc. then you would probably like it. If you thought you were getting a video showing a real aerobic workout session in the nude...forget it. Definately different, but not what I expected.

About 50 minutes aerobics with 4 beautiful young ladies, completely nude. In my opinion a bit too many unnecessary close-ups, but as well in quality and quantity this is the best nude DVD I've seen as far. If anyone knows a better one, please tell me... So this DVD is worth the 5 stars.

This video was purchased as a motivational tool.  Can't afford a gym, and nothing can get me out of the chair faster, than to workout with some fine naked women.  The video is well made for what it is, but leans more towards female objectification than a workout partner.  Each new exercise starts out with artistic close-ups, so unless you preview and memorize the video, you won't know which exercise to switch to.  Then, there is an annoying icon to tell you about hidden video - which is not all that hot.  Just a couple more close-ups is it.  Nothing that can't be seen in the regular footage.  I would rather the hidden video show close-ups of the muscle groups the exercise used.  Where to feel the burn and tightness.  The video would rate 5 stars if I bought it because I get off watching nice naked girls bend and twist.  However, I bought it as a motivational workout tool, and for that it is at least a little (2 star) do able.  Nice production work, decent quality, and that accounts for one of the stars - that makes it three.  Simon says, film maker - pick your audience.  Either those who want to workout, or those wanting very soft porn... you can't please both.
Half the movie is looking through a screen and the rest was to dark to see what was going on !

This video was pretty ok and kinda hot. I was getting dizzy from the camera moving around too much. There wasn't much stillness, just alot of rotating camera movement. the girls were awesome. They were all hot! One thing that amazed me was that throughout the whole video, the girls are moving and exercising the whole time, which was amazing, and the exercise they do are very beneficial as well. This video would make a great gift to a guy or maybe a girl, what the heck! Have fun watching :)

Some of the shots should have been a little more delayed ,

however , the cd in general was great , I enjoyed it very much .

 Thank You.

This video is for those persons who will enjoy seeing women's bodies in motion. The human form, especially one in good shape, is a delight to behold. Totally nude gives the viewer a chance to view not just the form but also the musculature of a body in motion. As you might have guessed this video is not an instructional workout video, but it is one of entertainment that will be enjoyable to the viewer.

If you want an instructional workout video then go with something by Kathy Ireland or Denise Austin... this vid is simply naked women doing aerobics. From a straight male's perspective it's absolutely awesome and very entertaining, but don't expect this to be an instructional workout video as that is NOT it's purpose. The women are very attractive and energetic and of course VERY nude! But then again, that's the point isn't it?

This DVD is for men and gay women only.  Ladies, if you are looking for a good aerobic workout video, you won't find it here.  Instead, you will find a soft-core porn movie.  This is geared towards people who want to drool over seeing naked women prance around.  What a waste of time.  If you want to get in shape and become fit, look elsewhere.

I've seen many good reviews about this DVD, and I went ahead and bought it off Amazon. The verdict? HUGE disappointment!!! What's wrong with these people who say this Totally Nude Aerobics is any good at all?! The girls are heavily made up, the Asian one particularly looks like a 1960s Shanghai hooker. The music is downright cheesy, like straight from some home-made cheap porn. The so-called "aerobics" are simply repetitive movements that bore you after just 5 minutes! Spend your money elsewhere! Give this piece of junk a miss!

The women are heavily made up and look fierce, like they are about to kill you.  The moves they do involve a lot of head shaking and they repeat the same movement over and over and over and over and over and over.  The women might be attractive were it not for their heavily made up faces.  They look like they are fresh off a cheap porn site.  The slow motion scenes show an unnatural fascination with their crotches and the music is terrible.  I happen to like nude women, but I enjoy them when they are innocent, care free, when the focus is on the form, not the sexual aspect.  This was a stupid movie.  I would call it trashy, but that's just my opinion.

  In short: No aerobics, trashy, generally unsmiling women, stupid music, fascination with crotches (and knees? terrible closeups...)If you are a fan of porn, this is your cup of tea.  If you like classic beauty or are looking to study the human form, look elsewhere.

This is definitely one for the gents!  I can't reccomend it highly enough!  Those of us who remember the aerobics craze in the eighties may remember a t.v. show called "20-minute workout" which featured stunningly beautiful women scantily (and scandously!) clad in spandex leotards and/or tights performing aerobic exercise to a white background.  This show was either worked out to, or, "worked out to!" at the time. This dvd is made by the same guy. But he definitely takes it to the next level, clothed as well as nude! I love everything about this dvd.

There is an intensely ascetic and subtle erotic flavor to its' presentation.  The white background prevents any distractions interrupting one's appreciation of the female form. The dvd is well put together and offers a lot of content.  There are many scenes easily referenced in the menus, one has a choice to view the performers clothed or nude, and there is even a bonus feature:  while viewing the nude version press the menu button on the remote and a close-up scene is played- a voyeur's dream come true!  Ron Harris is a genius!

Way back at the beginning of the Aerobics craze, Ron Harris put out a video called Aerobicise: Beautiful Workout. This showed a number of women in spandex (a new material at the time) performing rhythmically, and some say erotically, in a stark white studio. The implied eroticism of this film (seen briefly in a scene of Risky Business) has been brought to full fruition in these two new films.

 This disk contains two nearly-identical films with only a difference in coverage. Ron Harris's Nude Aerobics is just that. Scenes of women bouncing in aerobic poses almost identical to the original Aerobicise. There is no talking or explanations as to what each movement will help or provide but anyone who can keep up will definitely be in shape.

 The second film, Ron Harris's New Aerobics, is identical to the first except that the women involved and wearing colorful spandex and not their birthday suits.

 The nude version includes extra footage for those who are watching for more than just exercise. When a small camera appears in the lower right corner, just hit the menu button on your remote and you will get a minute or two of a closer and often more explicit camera angle. To scan through this footage, just advance to the start of each track and hit the menu button. If the track has extra footage, you will see it at this point without having to wait for the camera icon.

 Nicely put together with a professional look. The stark-white set offers no distraction and adds an arty quality to the visuals. The original Aerobicise offered four "workouts" but this disk has more and each can be accessed directly by way of the menu.

Attractive girls, June 6, 2003
 Reviewer: A viewer from MA United States
Of course, it's not aerobics, but anyway I did not expect it. Just very nice girls (especially jumping one). I would put 5 stars if it was real aerobics with attractive (naked!) instructor.
Since there are some who give their comment as this is erotic and they are probably teaching how to have sex in the air either....never mind take this like a dream.

The movements are repetitive, the filming bad, the sound-track straight out of a porn-flick.
If you want erotica or soft-porn, go for the Playboy productions.  If you want exercise, go for an exercise DVD.  This is neither, and not worthwhile.

One has from one to four nude young women going through a series of very energetic aerobics.  Many different camera angles.  The nude and the clothed workouts are separate, and each about an hour in length.  You cannot use the menu button to go back once you selected the program.  So if one wants a specific scene, select it in the beginning.  The reason is that during some of the routines, a blue camera icon appears.  You hit the menu button, and you get a brief different and much closer camera view of a particular portion of the exerciser, after which it defaults to continue with the routine.  The slide show is next to worthless.  I feel it is overpriced.
as expected
Total crap!
Loved it. You don't be disappointed
This DVD makes a good bachelor party or "fluff" flick! Deserves a six star rating! Thanx!
It was dull.
Yes girls are fine.  Bleached hair not attractive.  Form they use is not recommended.  It could hurt your knees.
Great video , if only they made female mud or oil wrestling videos,
Sexy!

Rated "R" for displaying nude bodies in action.  Females models doing stretching exercises in group.  Kicking and jumping in this fast pace,
certainly makes one sweating a lot.  Kind of an funny way to keep fit for women and men.
